snippet: Samuel See, 34, an assistant English professor, was found dead in a New Haven jail cell last month, after a domestic dispute with his husband.
abstract: Questions linger regarding death of Samuel See, assistant English professor at Yale University who was found dead in a New Haven jail cell following domestic dispute with his husband; investigators are now examining the circumstances of his arrest and death, to see if he had been ill or injured and to determine whether authorities are blame in any way.

byline.original: By N. R. KLEINFIELD and ARIEL KAMINER
byline.contributor: Joseph Berger contributed reporting, and Alain Delaquérière contributed research.

lead_paragraph: Samuel See, 34, an assistant English professor, was found dead in a New Haven jail cell last month, after a domestic dispute with his husband.

headline.main: Questions Linger After Death of Yale Teacher in Police Custody
headline.print_headline: Questions Linger After Death of Yale Teacher in Police Custody
